name: Get out of the Flag
description:
HI ! i'm Darkyann
This game has create for the GMTK Game Jame
(it's my first Game Jam)

the Theme was : Genre without Mechanic

So I create a Plateformer game without the mechanic of "End"

Story : You're a hero of a video game who Don't want to finish the levels

and try to get out of the limits of this video game with bug ,

and the game is "finish" when you reache the "No End Game".
